notes: Successive attacks do not stack but refresh the duration instead. Does not stack with the slow and damage over time of Corrosion. If both debuffs are present, Orb of Venom's debuff does not slow or deal damage.
Does not stack with the slow and damage over time of Corrosion.
If both debuffs are present, Orb of Venom's debuff does not slow or deal damage.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own attack damage.
If both melee and ranged hero with Orb of Venom attack the same target, the values of the first applied debuff is used and refreshed.
Deals damage in 1-second intervals, starting 1 second after the debuff is applied, resulting in 2 instances. Can deal up to 4 damage (before reductions).

The damage from Poison Attack is direct HP Removal, so it does not trigger any on-damage effects.
Does not work against wards, buildings or allied units.
abilities.description: Poisons the target, dealing 2 magical damage per second and slowing movement by 13% if the equipped hero is melee, or by 4% if they are ranged. Lasts for 2 seconds.

name: Orb of Venom
description: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
trivia: Orb of Venom's lore Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper. is a reference to the quote of V for Vendetta. "Weapon" was intentionally written wrong, with a V, for the reference's sake.
